msg:
## Hades Star Maintence Result
The following things have been added to webhook messages:
**All events type:**
- Corporation id and name
Webhook messages now have something like this:
```json
"Corporation":{"CorporationID":"3de5259ba12509e4d02854f1414caacf3d0aaaf79f417b9d843ff20ca35863dd","CorporationName":"Atlas Star llc."}```Which is completely useless to us
**WhiteStarStarted**
- The payload should now have the slot number where the scan took place
We gonna use it to better alert players about star was found, issue: I have no idea how it look in payload

## Misc
- Special Inter-Federation RS Event
Because of that I often announce many things, and I ping you all accept my apologies
As a reward for securing victory in **Mission Judgment of Cerberus Interceptor**, for all red stars until the end of the event (<t:1746068628:F> <t:1746068628:R>) the bonus multiplier was set to **x3.25**

- Holidays Coming Up:
> <t:1746050460:D> <t:1746050460:t> - <t:1746136740:t> [Labour Day]  
> <t:1746136860:D> <t:1746136860:t> - <t:1746223140:t> [Flag Day (Poland)]  
> <t:1746223260:D> <t:1746223260:t> - <t:1746309540:t> [Constitution Day (Poland)]
There is a high chance that you will receive some bonuses during these time periods
-# (Timestamp show date for UTC+2, Poland time zone, discord will show it in your current time zone)

***News from <t:1746004026:D> <t:1746003600:t> provided by <@987284796789116949>!***
